___pickup_time.description: defines a time window in which the carrier should pickup shipments

___carrier.description: acronym of the carrier you want to use

___pickup_address.description: address where the carrier should pick up shipments

___phone.description: telephone number (mandatory when using UPS and the following terms apply: service is one_day or one_day_early or ship to country is different than ship from country)

___country.description: Country as uppercase ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code

___id.description: identifier of a previously created address
